meanings.definition: A stable subatomic particle with a negative charge.
meanings.sent1: Electrons are tiny particles that move around the nucleus of an atom.
meanings.sent2: The electrons in this wire carry electricity to power the light bulb.
meanings.sent3: When the electrons decided to have a dance party, the atoms couldn't stay still!
meanings.sent4: The electrons buzzed around like busy bees in the hive of an atom.
meanings.sent5: Imagine electrons as little negative magnets that stick to the positive nucleus.

meanings.definition: An electron is a fundamental constituent of matter.
meanings.sent1: We learned in science class that electrons are part of everything around us.
meanings.sent2: The electron plays a crucial role in the structure of an atom.
meanings.sent3: The electron was the VIP guest at the atomic party.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like electrons, always present and influencing the conversation.
meanings.sent5: In the world of atoms, electrons are the silent architects shaping the universe.
